languages.text: "Зачем?" {n}Злоба глумливо взирает на вас.{/n} "Конвектор ведь уже починен. С чего мне тебе помогать?"
"Why should I?" {n}Malice looks at you with contempt.{/n} "The convector's fixed already. What's the point in me helping you?"
languages.original_text: "Зачем?" {n}Злоба глумливо взирает на вас.{/n} "Конвектор ведь уже починен. С чего мне тебе помогать?"

traits.locale_text: "Why should I?" {n}Malice looks at you with contempt.{/n} "The convector's fixed already. What's the point in me helping you?"
"Why should I?" {n}Malice looks at you with contempt.{/n} "The convector's fixed already. What's the point in me helping you?"
"Why should I?" {n}Malice looks at you with contempt.{/n} "The convector's fixed already. What's the point in me helping you?"
"Why should I?" {n}Malice looks at you with contempt.{/n} "The convector's fixed already. What's the point in me helping you?"

languages.text: “我凭什么要帮你？”{n}恶棍轻蔑地看着你。{/n}“对流加热器已经修好了，我为什么还要帮你呢？”
languages.original_text: "Why should I?" {n}Malice looks at you with contempt.{/n} "The convector's fixed already. What's the point in me helping you?"

traits.locale_text: “我凭什么要帮你？”{n}恶棍轻蔑地看着你。{/n}“对流加热器已经修好了，我为什么还要帮你呢？”

languages.text: «¿Y por qué iba a hacerlo?». {n}Malicia te mira con desprecio.{/n} «El convector ya está arreglado, ¿por qué iba a ayudarte?».
languages.original_text: "Why should I?" {n}Malice looks at you with contempt.{/n} "The convector's fixed already. What's the point in me helping you?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Y por qué iba a hacerlo?». {n}Malicia te mira con desprecio.{/n} «El convector ya está arreglado, ¿por qué iba a ayudarte?».

languages.text: 「なぜだ？」{n}マリスはこちらを軽蔑するように見てきた。{/n}「温度調整器は直ったのだろう。貴様を助ける意味はもうない」
languages.original_text: "Why should I?" {n}Malice looks at you with contempt.{/n} "The convector's fixed already. What's the point in me helping you?"

traits.locale_text: 「なぜだ？」{n}マリスはこちらを軽蔑するように見てきた。{/n}「温度調整器は直ったのだろう。貴様を助ける意味はもうない」

languages.text: "Warum sollte ich?" {n}Tücke blickt dich voller Verachtung an.{/n} "Der Konvektor ist bereits repariert. Weshalb sollte ich Euch also helfen?"
languages.original_text: "Why should I?" {n}Malice looks at you with contempt.{/n} "The convector's fixed already. What's the point in me helping you?"

traits.locale_text: "Warum sollte ich?" {n}Tücke blickt dich voller Verachtung an.{/n} "Der Konvektor ist bereits repariert. Weshalb sollte ich Euch also helfen?"

languages.text: {n}Démon vous lance un regard méprisant.{/n} « Pourquoi ? Le convecteur est déjà réparé. À quoi bon perdre mon temps à vous aider ? »
languages.original_text: "Why should I?" {n}Malice looks at you with contempt.{/n} "The convector's fixed already. What's the point in me helping you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Démon vous lance un regard méprisant.{/n} « Pourquoi ? Le convecteur est déjà réparé. À quoi bon perdre mon temps à vous aider ? »

languages.text: "Neden bende olacakmış?" {n}Melanet, iğrentiyle sana bakıyor.{/n} "Bağlayıcı zaten tamir olmuş. Yardım etmezsem ne olacak?"
languages.original_text: "Why should I?" {n}Malice looks at you with contempt.{/n} "The convector's fixed already. What's the point in me helping you?"
